about_the_game:
Explore Kibogamine in this expansion DLC!

A NEW THREAT...
Every monster of Kibogamine wears a bear mask...
Only a true Tiki bro' can overcome the tough fight
these creatures will put on!

MONOKUMA MASKS
We got a hold of Monokuma masks from Danganronpa!
Weird, but for some reason even monsters with the same mask come after the chibis...

DLC CONTENT
  • New Area : Kibogamine (3 stages)
  • New Enemies : (4 types)
  • New Tower : Mana
  • New Masks (8 motifs)
detailed_description:
Explore Kibogamine in this expansion DLC!

A NEW THREAT...
Every monster of Kibogamine wears a bear mask...
Only a true Tiki bro' can overcome the tough fight
these creatures will put on!

MONOKUMA MASKS
We got a hold of Monokuma masks from Danganronpa!
Weird, but for some reason even monsters with the same mask come after the chibis...

DLC CONTENT
  • New Area : Kibogamine (3 stages)
  • New Enemies : (4 types)
  • New Tower : Mana
  • New Masks (8 motifs)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i3-3000 series or better Dual Core CPU. i5 or better recommended.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 or better.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore Kibogamine in this expansion DLC!
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
